com.serotonin.bacnet4j.transport

Class Transport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.serotonin.bacnet4j.transport.Transport

  • public class Transport
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides segmentation support for all data link types.
    Author:
    Matthew
